sense.name: observe, perceive
sense.examples: They noted that it was a fine day to go sailing. She noted that someone was following her. Take note of this chemical reaction. He noted a small opening in the wall where light shone through. Please note that tomorrow you must use the back entrance to the building.

sense.name: make a written note of something
sense.commentary: Note: CAREFUL: The text must indicate in some way that writing is involved in order for you to select this sense! Ex: "She noted everything he said," should be tagged as sense 1; "She noted everything he said *in her diary*" would be tagged as sense 2.
sense.examples: She noted everything he said in her small diary. You'd better note this down unless your memory is really good!
